dict.acceptation: 食品杂货店；食品杂货业；

sent.orig: We take cloth bags to the grocery store instead of using paper or plastic grocery sacks.
sent.trans: 去杂货店购物，我们带着布袋，而不使用杂货店的纸袋或是塑料袋。

sent.orig: Products in the grocery are sold at reasonable price.
sent.trans: 这间杂货店的产品价格公道。

sent.orig: Hank, the grocery store man, came each week to stock his shelves and bring Greta supplies.
sent.trans: 每周，杂货店老板汉克都会给她送来材料，并从她那里进货。

sent.orig: The hunter came into a grocery and told his story.
sent.trans: 猎人走进一家食品店，讲述了这件事。

sent.orig: Many grocery stores sell gourmet pet foods to owners eager to please their pets.
sent.trans: 很多杂货店都卖有宠物美食，让主人可以讨好他们的宠物。
